CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 19, 1959, pg. A6 reads:"Briefing Institute Staff - Dr. David H. Bradley of Bedford, Pa., standing left, who is director of Leadership Education for the AME Zion Church, conducted a Leadership Institute for the AME Zion Pittsburgh District Christian Department last week-end at Wesley Center Church. Staff members, seated left to right, are Mmes.  Marjorie Walton, district director; Bety Dantzler, Corrie Winston, Esther McClung, and junior leaders, Donald Davis, Joyce Sharpe, Carolyn Brock and Esther Nixon.  Others, standing clockwise, are Mrs. Alice Suber, Sharon Harper, Mrs. Emily L. Hagar, conference director; Mrs. Daisy Goldsmith and the Rev. E.M. Williams. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Dr. David H. Bradley, conducting a Leadership Institute for the AME Zion Pittsburgh District Christian Department, from left, seated: Marjorie Walton, Bety Dantzler, Corrie Winston, Esther McClung, Donald Davis, Joyce Sharpe, Carolyn Brock, and Esther Nixon; standing: Alice Suber, Sharon Harper, Emily L. Hagar, Daisy Goldsmith, and Rev. E.M. Williams, gathered in Wesley AME Zion Church, another version
